document.title: Reference for `eif_protect'
document.paragraph:
2SYNOPSYS
#include "eif_hector.h"
EIF_OBJECT eif_protect (EIF_REFERENCE ref);
2DESCRIPTION The eif_protect() function protects the Eiffel reference ref from the GC. It keeps a reference on it so that the Garbage Collector does not collect it if it is not referenced from Eiffel any longer.
2RETURN VALUE The eif_protect() function returns an EIF_OBJECT. ThisEIF_OBJECT can be used later on to access ref with eif_access ().
2CONFORMANCE ISE Eiffel 4. 4 and later.
2COMPATIBILTY It is equivalent to henter(), which is deprecated.
2SEE ALSO
eif_access(1), eif_protect(1) , eif_wean(1).
